name: PULSE (itch) (Nomspot)
description:
Made for My First Game Jam: Winter 2023

Description:

This game is about finding bubbles within the dark.

Using your ability to gain a bit of information and moving forward to unveil what's infront of you.

Credits:

Nomspot - Coding , Music / SFX , Level Designing;

Hely - Art , Level Designing;
